title: Automatic reminder for daily log
body_html:
As we talked about in our weekly organizer hangout yesterday, a lot of what the supervisors are doing is nagging teams to get stuff done. Which wears them down and shouldn't be the main task of our supervisors. So I thought about how to make at least some of the process automated to take it out of their hands. And one thing would be to send an email reminder at hour xy to the team if they haven't filled out their daily log. This way we nag them without having to do it ourselves and they get accustomed to doing it everyday from the beginning on.

Exception would have to be weekends.

@sareg0 was interested in helping to think about how we could implement something like that.

Comments? Opinions?
